page.title: 04Ernest Doe & Sons Ltd.
page.content: Ernest Doe & Sons Ltd. started in 1900 as a small blacksmith and has grown to one of the largest agricultural, commercial and construction machinery companies in the country. The firm has eleven branches with a turnover in excess of Â£30 million. The head office just outside Hatfield Peverel covers eleven and a half acres. They have their own show in February each year and are one of the main exhibitors at the Essex show in July. The total workforce in the group is approximately 400, and those employed at head office all live locally. The company encourages local schools to participate in work experience and employs a number of apprentices. The management at present is considering expanding into the export field.
